prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress that looked stunning online, but when it arrived, the color was completely different and the fabric felt cheap.

The customer service representative was rude and unhelpful; it felt like I was bothering them by asking for assistance.

I can't believe the wait time at this restaurant. After an hour, our food still hadn't arrived, and no one seemed to care.

I subscribed for a premium service, but the features they advertised are not available. Very misleading!

After my recent flight, I’m convinced this airline has the worst customer service. They lost my luggage and didn’t even apologize.

The app crashed repeatedly while I was trying to book my tickets. It was frustrating and wasted so much of my time.

I left the coffee shop disappointed. My drink was lukewarm and tasted burnt, definitely not worth the price.

I tried to reach customer support for help, but I was put on hold for over thirty minutes. Completely unacceptable!

The hotel promised a sea view, but we were stuck in a room facing a brick wall. Not what I expected for the price.

I was excited about the new feature on the app, but it’s glitchy and doesn’t work half the time. What a letdown!

The pasta I ordered was undercooked and tasted bland. I expected better from this place.

I received my online order late, and when it finally arrived, it was missing an item. Very disappointing experience!

The staff at the store seemed disinterested and unhelpful when I needed assistance. I won’t be returning.

I thought I was getting a great deal with the subscription, but the service has been consistently poor since I signed up.

The online description of the product was misleading; what I received was not at all what I expected.

I had an awful experience at the restaurant. The waiter forgot my order, and when I reminded him, he was dismissive.

I signed up for a trial, but the cancellation process was frustrating and complicated. I felt trapped.

My meal took forever to arrive, and when it did, it was cold. I won’t be coming back anytime soon.

I was looking forward to using this app, but it crashes every time I try to open it. So frustrating!

The quality of the product was way below my expectations. I feel like I wasted my money.

The travel agency promised a seamless experience, but they messed up my itinerary and left me stranded.

I found the shopping experience to be frustrating due to the slow website and constant errors during checkout.

The service at the restaurant was very slow, and the waiter seemed overwhelmed and unfocused.

My last order arrived with a damaged item, and the return process has been a nightmare.

I was really disappointed with the customer support. They didn’t resolve my issue and barely listened to my concerns.

I had high hopes for this app, but it has been nothing but problems since I downloaded it.

The food was overpriced and didn’t taste fresh at all; I expected much better from this establishment.

I tried to reach out to customer service via chat, but they were unresponsive and I ended up giving up.

The promotional email I received promised discounts that were not available when I tried to use them. What a scam!

I visited the restaurant based on great reviews, but my experience was lackluster and far from impressive.

The subscription service has been riddled with issues, and I’m starting to regret ever signing up.

I was shocked at how rude the staff were during my last visit. It really put a damper on my experience.

The online shopping platform is frustrating to navigate; it took me forever to find what I was looking for.

My recent flight was delayed for hours with no updates from the airline. Very frustrating!

The product I received was defective, and getting a refund has been a hassle.

I expected a lot more from this hotel based on the photos; it was outdated and not clean.

The app is full of bugs, and I keep losing my progress. It’s really ruining my experience.

I had to wait too long for my food, and when it finally arrived, it was cold and unappetizing.

The customer service line is a joke; no one ever seems to have answers to simple questions.

I’m really disappointed with the quality of the item I received. It looks nothing like the pictures.

The travel agent didn’t listen to my preferences and booked a trip that was completely wrong for me.
